select_aspects_already_actively_involved.label: 1. In which aspects of the project have you already actively involved patients or their carers, service users or members of the public? Include patient and public involvement from wider programmes that has informed this project. Select all that apply:
values: identifying, developing, or prioritising the research question
being a member of a research advisory or reference group
developing the risk or benefit analysis (for example, identifying and evaluating the probable risks and burden involved for research participants)

details_involved_contributors.label: 1a. Give details of how you involved public contributors
details_involved_contributors.value: I involved them by X, Y and Z

reasons_for_not_involving.label: 1b. What are your reasons for not involving these people?
